name: Thistle Exeter City Centre, The Rougemont

reviews.text: I've lived in this hotel for 2 nights last year. It was alright, staff were helpful, and the main problem was the room looked very "old" however everything in the room were working as we hope. The location was the main reason we chose the hotel, its very close to high street, local spots and resturants. It was a good bargin if you are looking for some place that is just fine, without any problems, nothing more and nothing less, I think this hotel would be a good place to stay.
reviews.title: average

reviews.text: We tried the breakfast in the hotel, it was not bad.
reviews.title: Weekend in an oven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The main problem with this hotel is the heat!! In warm weather it is stifling!!! Most hotels if lacking air conditioning like this one, will normally give you a fan to help cool you down, no not here, nothing but a nice thick duvet!! The windows open a tiny amount so no cooling to come from there either. It looks like a lot of money at some point has been spent on the foyer and reception area, lift and heated towel rack (like they needed heating) which you cannot turn off and rather easy to accidently burn yourself on!!! I would say that money would have been better spent on some air con!!!
reviews.title: A real find for experienced travelers

likes.disliked: — Finding it with a map while driving on the left side of the road

reviews.text: Apart from that I felt the room seemed rather dated and could do with some rennovation, the bathroom looks like something you'd find in the 60's!!
reviews.title: Superb hotel

likes.disliked: — Having a connecting door in the room and no chain or spyhole on the main door.

aka: The Rougemont Hotel, Exeter Hotel Exeter
description: An elegant Victorian building situated close to the railway station, The Rougemont Hotel is the ideal base from which to explore this historic city. You can walk straight into city centre, with its fine shopping, Roman walls and beautiful Cathedral.
